content.html: I don't care that Madison Cawthorn likes to wear lingerie in his free time. It doesn't bother me, and it doesn't affect me. If he wants to be playful with gender expression, it's his life. I do care that Madison Cawthorn attacks trans people and shames us for living our lives.
content.value:
I don't care that Madison Cawthorn likes to wear lingerie in his free time. It doesn't bother me, and it doesn't affect me. If he wants to be playful with gender expression, it's his life.

I do care that Madison Cawthorn attacks trans people and shames us for living our lives.
